title: Books for Every Child in Eastwood
short: Help the Eastwood Public Library expand its children’s collection to ensure every child has access to diverse stories.
description: The Eastwood Public Library serves over 30,000 residents in our community, including nearly 9,000 school-aged children. With rising demand for children’s books that reflect diverse cultures, identities, and experiences, the library is struggling to keep up. This campaign will raise funds to expand the children’s collection by 1,500 new titles, ensuring that every child can see themselves reflected in the books they read and discover new perspectives. By contributing, you are investing in a future where all children in Eastwood grow up with equal opportunities to learn, dream, and thrive.
